text: Mërgim Bajraktari (born 27 May 1993 in Basel, Switzerland) is an Albanian footballer who plays for FC Liestal. ==Club career== On 1 July 2015, Bajraktari started a trial at Scottish Premiership side Hearts and he started in a 2–0 friendly win over Irish side Bohemian FC on the same day. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:People from Basel-Stadt Category:Kosovo Albanians Category:Swiss people of Albanian descent Category:Swiss people of Kosovan descent Category:Association football midfielders Category:Swiss footballers Category:Albanian footballers Category:Kosovan footballers Category:Albania youth international footballers Category:Albania under-21 international footballers Category:Yverdon Sport FC players Category:FC Stade Nyonnais players Category:Albanian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Switzerland Category:Albanian expatriate sportspeople in Switzerland
title: Mërgim Bajraktari
